text: Courtesy of Eames' grandson, Eames Demetrios: <https://www.ted.com/talks/the_design_genius_of_charles_and_ray_eames>

attachments.title: The design genius of Charles + Ray Eames
attachments.text: The legendary design team Charles and Ray Eames made films, houses and classic midcentury modern furniture. Eames Demetrios, their grandson, shows rarely seen films and archival footage in a lively, loving tribute to their creative process.
attachments.fallback: The design genius of Charles + Ray Eames
